document_data.name: ''Ring of Crimson''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rings of Crimson''''' were common minor magic items found across the [[Sword Coast]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: These [[ring]]s were imbued with simple [[enchantment]]s that made them glow with soft red light, illuminating the area of {{SI|15'|'"|long=yes}} around them.
document_data.History: By [[1372 DR]], these common pieces of enchanted jewelry were found across many pockets, fingers, and merchant stalls across the Sword Coast, and the [[Moonsea]], and in cites such as [[Neverwinter]] and [[Daggerford]]. Especially popular among adventurers, freeing their hand for weapons and tools, instead of holding [[lantern]]s and [[torch]]es. One of these rings was found in an ancient crypt in the [[Brush of Barbs]] of [[Delimbiyr Vale]].
